Notes

Gatefold sleeve. Includes a fold-out poster. Sticker with barcode : 6 1350-50075-1 3 5000 pressed in 2003 10000 pressed in 2004. Barcode only on 2004 pressing. Copies of the 2003 pressing purchased online directly from Gold Standard Laboratories included a CDr with demo versions of select tracks.
